org.youscope.server

Class YouScopeServerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.youscope.server.YouScopeServerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, YouScopeServer

    public class YouScopeServerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements YouScopeServer
    Server which controls the microscope and gets measurement jobs from (visual) clients.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int REGISTRY_PORT
      The standard port for this server.

    • Method Detail

      • startServer

        public void startServer()
        Adds the server to the registry such that it can be accessed by other processes or over the network. Queries for the port.

      • startServer

        public void startServer(int port,
                        java.lang.String password)
        Adds the server to the registry such that it can be accessed by other processes or over the network.
        Parameters:
        port - Port at which the server should be available.
        password - The password for this server.

      • setConfigureMicroscopeConnection

        public void setConfigureMicroscopeConnection(boolean forceConfiguration)
        If true, sets the YouScope server to ask for the microscope connection the next time. If false, the YouScope tries to connect to the microscope using the last settings. However, if this does not work, the user is queried, too.
        Parameters:
        forceConfiguration - True if before the next time a microscope connection is established, the user should be asked for the connection type.

      • initializeProgram

        public void initializeProgram()
                       throws MicroscopeException
        Initializes the program by connecting and initializing the microscope.
        Throws:
        MicroscopeException

      • initializeProgram

        public void initializeProgram(java.lang.String configFile)
                       throws MicroscopeException
        Initializes the program by connecting and initializing the microscope.
        Parameters:
        configFile - The microscope configuration file with which the server should be started. If set to null, no drivers are initialized.
        Throws:
        MicroscopeException

      • startProgram

        public void startProgram()
                  throws MicroscopeException
        Starts and run the main loop of the server. Has to be invoked for the server to accept client inputs. Must be invoked not before initialization.
        Throws:
        MicroscopeException

      • quitProgram

        public void quitProgram()
        Shut down the program. The microscope is uninitialized.

      • addServerFinishListener

        public void addServerFinishListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener listener)
        Adds a listener which gets notified if the server finished execution. The listener than e.g. can call System.exit(0).
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener which should be added.

      • removeServerFinishListener

        Parameters:
